templates.introInstruction:
Questions 11-16
Choose the correct letter, A, B or C.

questionBlock.question: What made David leave London and move to Northsea?

options.text: He was eager to develop a hobby.
He wanted to work shorter hours.
He found his job in website design unsatisfying.

questionBlock.question: The Lifeboat Institution in Northsea was built with money provided by

options.text: a local organisation.
a local resident.
the local council.

questionBlock.question: In his health assessment, the doctor was concerned about the fact that David

options.text: might be colour blind.
was rather short-sighted.
had undergone eye surgery.

questionBlock.question: After arriving at the lifeboat station, they aim to launch the boat within

options.text: five minutes.
six to eight minutes.
eight and a half minutes.

questionBlock.question: As a 'helmsman', David has the responsibility of deciding

options.text: who will be the members of his crew.
what equipment it will be necessary to take.
if the lifeboat should be launched.

questionBlock.question: As well as going out on the lifeboat, David

options.text: gives talks on safety at sea.
helps with fundraising.
recruits new volunteers.

templates.formattingInstruction: Which TWO things does David say about the lifeboat volunteer training?

questionBlock.question: Which TWO things does David say about the lifeboat volunteer training?

options.text: The residential course developed his leadership skills.
The training in use of ropes and knots was quite brief.
The training exercises have built up his mental strength.
The casualty care activities were particularly challenging for him.
The wave tank activities provided practice in survival techniques.

questionBlock.question: Which TWO things does David find most motivating about the work he does?

options.text: working as part of a team
experiences when working in winter
being thanked by those he has helped
the fact that it keeps him fit
the chance to develop new equipment

templates.formattingInstruction: Which TWO things does David find most motivating about the work he does?
